content.div: Compiled binaries of the Release 2.0.2 of Carrot2 are available from the the build server:

ul.li:
Carrot2 search clustering web application (a WAR web application file)
Please see the readme.txt file in the distribution archive for installation instructions.

Carrot2 clustering GUI tool

content.div: Latest development version of Carrot2 is also available on our the build server. Note that these binaries may not run as expected (or at all):

ul.li:
Carrot2 search clustering web application (a WAR web application file)
Please see the readme.txt file in the distribution archive for installation instructions.

Carrot2 Document Clustering Server (a web application context with built-in Jetty server)
Please see the readme.txt file in the distribution archive for further instructions.

Carrot2 clustering GUI tool
